data.title: Stock market holiday 2025: Indian markets closed for Mahavir Jayanti

similar.title: Stock market holiday on Mahavir Jayanti 2025: Is trading open or closed on NSE, BSE today?
similar.description: Indian stock exchanges, BSE and NSE, will remain closed on April 10, 2025, for Mahavir Jayanti, with trading resuming on April 11. Investors are advised to plan trades ahead, as the Multi Commodity Exchange (MCX) will also observe a half-day holiday.

data.title: PM Modi to launch projects worth Rs 3,880 cr during Varanasi visit on April 11
data.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will visit his parliamentary constituency Varanasi on April 11, where he will address a public gathering and inaugurate and lay the foundation stone for 44 projects worth Rs 3,880 crore.
